item.description:
Vale D. has organized this event.

Join in the fun of socializing and relaxing at the comfortable and sophisticated Nubar Lounge located in Harvard Square’s landmark Sheraton Commander Hotel

Sitzundjiber Members, Friends and Guests will have a chance to mingle, enjoy refreshing beverages from the cash bar and sample delicious light appetizers provided by Sitz

The Nubar Lounge and Restaurant recently celebrated it’s One Year Anniversary with rave reviews for ambiance, amazing cuisine and delightful signature cocktails

Our September Afterwork will again be at the recently renovated Nubar on the edge of Harvard Sq.

This will be our 2nd visit to this location...the 1st time was a great success! As always light appetizers will be served (courtesy of Sitz) and lots of conversations and a good time will be had by all.

Please be considerate of others when RSVPing. Cancel your RSVP if you will not be attending to allow others to attend. Thanks!
item.how_to_find_us: We will be obvious! Look for the smiling faces.
item.name: Our September Afterwork will be at the Nubar in Cambridge
